settings.title: 100% ORGANIC PLANT STEM CELLS
settings.text:
Gardenia Florida (flower) stem cells: Clinically proven to promote multi-level protection of the scalp collagen network to prevent collagen loss and restores the balance of collagen turnover. Reduces MMP-1 synthesis to promote and stimulate new collagen synthesis.

Marrubium Vulgare stem cells: Clinically proven to protect the scalp skin cells from the penetration of pollutants and genetic damage which may lead to accelerated hair loss. Removes and neutralises the toxic species that damage proteins and lipid structure. Strengthens the scalp barrier and stimulates the skin’s natural antioxidants. Repairs the cell metabolism by replenishing the energy level and reducing inflammation which may accelerate hair loss.

settings.title: Cell Renewal and Regeneration
settings.text: Plant stem cells contain phytohormones and other growth factors that can promote cell renewal and regeneration. When applied to the scalp, these stem cells can stimulate dormant hair follicles, leading to new hair growth.

settings.title: Antioxidant Properties
settings.text: Plant stem cells are rich in antioxidants that protect hair follicles from oxidative stress and free radicals. This can prevent premature hair aging and hair loss.

settings.title: Anti-Inflammatory Effects
settings.text: Chronic inflammation in the scalp can contribute to hair loss. Plant stem cells have anti inflammatory properties that help reduce inflammation and create a healthier environment for hair growth.

settings.title: Improved Blood Circulation
settings.text: Some plant stem cell extracts can improve blood circulation in the scalp, delivering essential nutrients and oxygen to hair follicles, which supports healthy hair growth.

settings.code:
PLANT STEM CELLS

Plant stem cells are undifferentiated cells found in the meristems of plants.

They are responsible for the growth and development of various plant tissues. When used in hair products, plant stem cells are often derived from specific plants known for their regenerative properties.

Scalp Phix sources the plant stem cells from the Gardenia Florida extract and Marrubium Vulgare Extract. These plant stem cells have been proven to be the most effective for hair loss prevention.

settings.title: CELLULAR ACTIVE PEPTIDES
settings.text:
Peptides are short chains of amino acids, the building blocks of proteins. In hair care products, specific peptides are used due to their beneficial effects on hair growth and hair health

Biotinoyl Tetrapeptide-1: Clinically proven to fight against premature hair loss due to dihydrotestosterone (DHT) production by Inhibiting 5 alpha-reductase. This cellular stimulating peptide that promotes anti-aging processes in the follicle, encouraging anchoring of the molecules, supporting hair growth, and slowing down hair loss. The tripeptide complex of vitaminized (Vitamin B7) targets the leading cause of alopecia. Promotes hair growth as much as 121%.

Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Mryistoyl Hexapeptide-16, Myristoyl Tetrapeptide-12: Together these cellular peptides activate keratinous genes to boost hair growth. Significantly promotes the keratinocyte proliferation which leads to more keratin production and fuller, thicker hair.

Acetyl Tetrapeptide-3: Clinically proven to stimulate fibroblast around the dermal follicle to produce matrix protein (Collagen III, laminin, etc.) and collagen VII. Significantly fills the hair follicle to produce stronger, thicker, fuller hair.

settings.title: Follicle Stimulation
settings.text: Certain peptides can directly stimulate hair follicles, promoting the anagen (growth) phase of the hair cycle. This results in increased hair thickness and density.

settings.title: Collagen Production
settings.text: Peptides can stimulate collagen production in the scalp, which is crucial for maintaining the structural Integrity of hair follicles and promoting hair growth.

settings.title: Blocking DHT
settings.text: Dihydrotestosterone (DHT) is a hormone associated with hair loss in individuals with a genetic predisposition to androgenetic alopecia (pattern baldness). Some peptides can inhibit the activity of 5- alpha reductase, an enzyme responsible for converting testosterone to DHT, thus reducing hair loss.

settings.title: Improved Scalp Health
settings.text:
Peptides with anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties can enhance the overall health of the scalp, creating a conducive environment for hair growth

When plant stem cells and peptides are combined in hair care products, their synergistic effects can offer even more significant benefits for hair growth. Together, they provide a nourishing and stimulating environment for hair follicles, supporting hair regeneration, reducing hair loss, and promoting overall hair and scalp health.
